Entries.Daine.Dahlia.2H/t 1200 2200/SawEvent Dai: 50s/-100 -100/farmer 4 71 1 {{Dahlia}} 6 72 1 Aideen 20 67 1/action AddMail Current Daine.SeenEvent.Dahlia received/globalFadeToClear/skippable/viewport 15 71/advancedMove farmer false 12 0 0 -2 1 100/advancedmove {{Dahlia}} false 12 0 0 -3 3 100/viewport move 1 -1 2000/speak {{Dahlia}} "So I don't think I've ever asked, @ - what ARE you doing in the Valley, anyway?"/pause 250/waitforAllStationary/advancedMove Aideen false 0 5 20 0 1 100/emote farmer 8/question null " #I've been working for Joja for a while and needed a change of pace after all that.#My grandfather left me a farm out here when he passed, and I decided to see what it was like."/pause 250/stopMusic/emote {{Dahlia}} 40/pause 250/speak {{Dahlia}} "That's... that's it?$19"/pause 250/emote farmer 60/faceDirection {{Dahlia}} 2/speak {{Dahlia}} "I mean, that's a fine reason to move, I suppose, I just... I don't know. I kind of expected something a little more... intentional? Premeditated, maybe...?$15"/playmusic XOR/emote {{Dahlia}} 28/pause 250/speak {{Dahlia}} "I am glad that you're making a better life for you, though, I am! Don't get that mistaken, I'm just... surprised? Yes.$3#$b#You, you are happier, right?$9"/quickQuestion #What kind of roles did you play before you came here?#...What is it like, where you're from, then?(break)switchEvent Daine.Dahlia.2H.A(break)switchEvent Daine.Dahlia.2H.B
Entries.Daine.Dahlia.2H.A: friendship {{Dahlia}} 50/jump {{Dahlia}} 5/faceDirection {{Dahlia}} 3/emote {{Dahlia}} 288/animate {{Dahlia}} false false 250 12 21 22 23/animate {{Dahlia}} false true 250 24 23 24 23/speak {{Dahlia}} "Oh, I've played all sorts of things before! < $1"/pause 250/jump {{Dahlia}} 2/emote farmer 8/speak {{Dahlia}} "Most recently I was in something of a mentor's role, guiding a few young folk in the early throes of adulthood toward their dreams.$6#$b#I've also played a villainess, the one people tell stories to their children about, I've stood over chasms as a bridge of diplomacy, I've been the odd old biddy in the woods-$7#$b#Even a damsel in distress, that role was fun.$1"/pause 250/stopAnimation {{Dahlia}} 12//animate {{Dahlia}} false false 250 23 22 21 12/pause 250/jump {{Dahlia}} 3/emote {{Dahlia}} 288/speak {{Dahlia}} "I remember each performance as clearly as a photograph...oh, but I don't want to regress into old roles. I have to keep moving forward, you know?$7"/emote farmer 32/speak {{Dahlia}} "Anyway, sorry about being weird, I really am happy for you, I just... never mind. Thank you for sharing, farmer.$10"/emote farmer 28/pause 250/advancedMove farmer false 0 -20 4 100/advancedMove {{Dahlia}} false 0 -20 4 100/textAboveHead {{Dahlia}} "So what were you planning to do today, anyway?"/viewport move 0 -2 5000/pause 1000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.Daine.Dahlia.2H.B: faceDirection {{Dahlia}} 3/emote {{Dahlia}} 16/pause 250/emote farmer 8/pause 250/speak {{Dahlia}} "Well, it's, you know...$3"/pause 250/faceDirection {{Dahlia}} 2/emote {{Dahlia}} 40/pause 250/speak {{Dahlia}} "Different. Really very... very different from here. Honestly, I don't always feel like I've done the best job adjusting.$18"/emote farmer 28/emote {{Dahlia}} 16/jump {{Dahlia}} 4/faceDirection {{Dahlia}} 3/speak {{Dahlia}} "That's not a bad thing, though! New experiences help people grow, don't they? It doesn't matter if I'm from somewhere different, does it?$10#$b#As long as you don't mind being a little bit patient, I know I can say strange things from time to time. But I DO like it better here. At least, I think I do...?$14"/pause 250/emote {{Dahlia}} 28/pause 250/faceDirection {{Dahlia}} 0/textAboveHead {{Dahlia}} "Well, never mind any of that."/pause 250/speak {{Dahlia}} "I didn't come here to insult you, so I am sorry for my behavior earlier, I'm just terrible at hiding when I've been startled. I hope you can look past it, farmer."/emote farmer 32/pause 250/speak {{Dahlia}} "Then let's get going, shall we?$7"/advancedMove farmer false 0 -20 4 100/advancedMove {{Dahlia}} false 0 -20 4 100/textAboveHead {{Dahlia}} "So I wanted to see what Aideen was growing..."/viewport move 0 -2 5000/pause 1000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
